description.value:
Cost 1 Mythic Point

Effect The mythic striker automatically ends one effect that would give it a circumstance penalty to Speed. When it attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] an effect that has it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained], it automatically succeeds.
